availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owned eighteen enslaved individuals in Scott County, Kentucky in 1850. Owed twenty-four enslaved individuals in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 37.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 30.
Find A Grave, "Joseph Bonaparte Kenney (1802-1887)," Memorial #31938560, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/31938560 (accessed June 9, 2020).
